title: What's My Best Option??
body:
My first account (D3) was stolen as I gave my details to who I thought was a friend. After that I bought another unranked account which after 3 weeks I got to P5 before it was permanently banned because of levelling up by botting (I had no idea this was done by the person I bought it off). I have contacted RIOT however they are saying they wont help me, which I find ridiculous as the only person they are punishing is me who has done nothing wrong.

I would like to think that there is a less tedious way to get to where I was other than starting a new account, levelling it up to 30, acquiring the BE needed to buy the minimum 20 champs needed for ranked and then climbing to my previous elo. I enjoy playing this game however it gets frustrating playing with the lower elo players who just abuse and blame a lot of the time and would rather chase an enemy half way across the map over taking a free baron (I had forgotten how bad it was). I really dont want to have to go through that again, I just want to be playing at the level I was with people who I am on the same page as.

So... what can I do?


P.S. What is the reason the account I bought was picked up? I know of other players who have levelled up using botting however still have their accounts (or so i believe). Not to sound cocky but was it because of how fast i was climbing? Or was I reported by another player?

replies.body: It was a bought account, riot says thats against the rules so instabans you
I don't get some people's need to post useless comments. Your comment has nothing of value.  Why waste yours any my time?
Sharing accounts of any type etc is an instaban. You know.. Against the rules? So I wonder why they won't help you ü§î

Dude, everyone has read your post. Bottom line is that "transferring ownership" of accounts is a blatant breach of the ToU and EULA, and practically guaranteed to result in a perma-ban. Not only that, but using 3rd party software is also a blatant breach of the ToU and EULA, and practically guaranteed to result in a perma-ban (and practically every account that is up for sale was levelled using bots).

You ask in your post "What is the reason the account I bought was picked up?", and you have been given not one but **two** *very* good reasons (botting and buying).

Hey man. Fair enough reply. After thinking about it now I know the ban is completely justified, was just looking for a quick way to 30. However my question at the end is better worded as: 'why was my account picked up while others have not been?'. I know the reasons it was banned however I know of plenty of other bought accounts that have not been banned. Why was mine banned and theirs not?

Cheers
They do. Who are you to say they don't? lol. Some accounts that get bought have probably been levelled legit rather than botted.
'noob' says the poor kid that in the five years he has been playing has not achieved a positive winrates and barely reached gold. Don't overstep yourself champ
Noob... moron. Either way  üòÅ. Enjoy the people that might get baited by your shit tier bait ü§£
if your first account was 100% genuinely yours that you created riot can easily find it and help you get it back...oh wait you shared it lols next time follow the rules bud maybe next time
If your account was stolen and you can prove it then you can get riot to help you with that rather than your botted/boosted account.

Usually there's a clause in the Smurf website that will give you a new account if Riot bans it for the botting or account swapping thanks to their website system.

I know [site] does this. It can't be too bad since pretty much any big streamer promotes it (such as Nightblue3, BoxBox, Imaqtpie, Tyler1, etc.).

If you bought it off a dodgy site, then tough luck.
